title: Is there a mass activation solution?

sections.title: Symptoms
content:
• I work in an educational institution
  • I have many computers to activate
  • I am looking for a way to activate all my machines at once.

sections.title: Cause
content: If you have a full lab of machines to activate, obviously you would like to save as much time as possible. We do not yet have a mass activation option, but silent command line activation is the fastest way to activate multiple machines.

sections.title: Resolutions
content: At the moment, we do not support activation through imaging software, so the fastest way to activate multiple machines is to use Command Line/ Terminal.
Please see the link here for guidance.
The account username is the email address, not the real username.

sections.title: More Information
content: If you wish to return activations on your Educational License, or would like more information about Command Line activation, you can contact us here.
